instructions: On your phone, swipe down from the very top of the screen . Swipe down again to access your Quick Settings. Tap Flashlight . How to enable the flashlight on your Android phone How to enable the flashlight on your Android phone How to enable the flashlight on your Android phone Source: Joe Maring / Android Central

Open the Settings on your phone. Tap the search bar at the top of the page. Search "flashlight." Tap the toggle to turn it on.
